rows.label: qst650301_msg0001
rows.name: What's up?

rows.label: qst650301_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, you see, the thing
is, Your Highness...

rows.label: qst650301_msg0003
rows.name:
There was some...unpleasantness. I
have been trying to see if there's
anything that can be done, but...

rows.label: qst650301_msg0004
rows.name: What do you mean, "unpleasantness"?

rows.label: qst650301_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, you know there's been a rise
in foreign visitors to Luxuria
since we came out of isolation.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, Tora get it.
Mariecerzet is big racist.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0007
rows.name: Not at all! I think it's marvelous.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0008
rows.name:
For the most part. However, the influx
has brought plenty of unscrupulous
types. Folk who mean Luxuria harm.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0009
rows.name:
We can't let the Sanctus Chain
come under threat again.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0010
rows.name:
So the Luxurian army was deployed to
ensure its safety. That's when...

rows.label: qst650301_msg0011
rows.name:
The aforementioned
unpleasantness happened.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0012
rows.name: As you say.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0013
rows.name:
A horde of Garlus have taken
up residence in the area.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0014
rows.name:
Garlus, eh? Those hairy
blighters with the antlers?

rows.label: qst650301_msg0015
rows.name: They can be tough.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0016
rows.name:
We managed to corner them in the
Memorial Ruins, but from there it's
a straight shot to the Genbu Crown.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0017
rows.name:
That terrain is easy to defend
and difficult to attack.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0018
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0019
rows.name:
We were at a loss as to how to
mount an effective assault, and
so were forced to withdraw.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0020
rows.name: All right!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0021
rows.name: Sounds like a job for us!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0022
rows.name:
Oh, goodness, no, I didn't mean
for you to trouble yourselves...

rows.label: qst650301_msg0023
rows.name:
The Luxurian army has plenty of first-rate
Drivers at its disposal. We're planning
to put an elite team together.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0024
rows.name:
Yeah, but that'll take
forever. Time in which
more people could get hurt.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0025
rows.name: That's... Well, yes, but...

rows.label: qst650301_msg0026
rows.name:
Stop worrying! We'll
get it done, no sweat.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0027
rows.name: Well, if you insist... Good luck.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0028
rows.name: Thanks. Won't need it, though!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0101
rows.name: Cocky little so-and-so!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0102
rows.name: Hey, cut me some slack!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0103
rows.name:
We take on missions like
this all the time.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0104
rows.name: If we are asked.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0105
rows.name:
You don't wait to be asked when
people's lives are at stake.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0106
rows.name: Not so sure about that...

rows.label: qst650301_msg0107
rows.name:
Masterpon's motivations strictly based
on profit/loss calculations, so Hana
think words of Kamuya not applicable.

rows.label: qst650301_msg0108
rows.name: Tora is not so mercenary!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0109
rows.name:
Tora just think that if people
can do it themselves, friends
should let them do it!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0110
rows.name: Haha!

rows.label: qst650301_msg0111
rows.name:
Seriously, though, let's
just head over to the Memorial
Ruins and check it out.
